text: Lucas Malcotti (born 9 January 1995) is a Swiss épée fencer. He participated at the 2019 World Fencing Championships, winning a medal.2019 World Fencing Championships ranking ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss épée fencers Category:Swiss male fencers Category:World Fencing Championships medalists
title: Lucas Malcotti
